# Needed Skip works with two or more files.
## A Page Any [[plain text]] and [[markup]] content between two lines of XML, saved with the extension `.xml`.
<?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="0.xsl"?><x> CONTENT </x>
## The Skip file `0.xsl` The XSLT file that processes [[markup|page content]] into HTML.
# Optional ## CSS An optional CSS file can style the pages beyond the browser's default styling.
## Index `pages.xsl` An XSLT file containing a list of the site's pages. This file adds two features to the site:
- **Page Index** -- [[pages|A page linking to all pages from newest to oldest]]. - **Page Navigation** -- Links per page to the next older page and next newer page.
An optional [helper tool](https://gregabbott.pages.dev/json-feed-and-site-map-maker) can make and update this file.
